attributes.action: Financial Aid for people who work in catering & hospitality
attributes.additional_details: Create a budget to be distributed to those within the catering & hospitality industry to help them financially
attributes.background: Emergency financial aid for those who work in catering & hospitality and are experiencing pay shortage/redundancy during the coronavirus pandemic, resulting in the issues such as lack of funds to pay rent, buy essential food and pay council/government set bills.
